description: The BR-30 Regional Transport Office serves the Sitamarhi district in Bihar, headquartered in the administrative hub of Dumra near the Indo-Nepal border. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement for the entire district under the Tirhut Division. The office is vital for regulating cross-border transport and local movement in this culturally significant region known as the birthplace of Goddess Sita.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra Road, Behind Court Campus, Dumra, Sitamarhi, Bihar
